title: Can anyone translate ‘Googoosh-Gol Bi Goldoon’ song in English? - Quora

response.answer_text: Migufty bi to hicham You said without you I am nothingBa man bemun hamishe Stay with me foreverNabashi man mimiram If you aren’t here I will dieGol bi goldoon nemishe There cannot be a flower without a flower pot Che eshtebahi kardam What a mistake I madeHarfato bavar kardam I believed your wordsChe eshtebahi kardam What a mistake I madeHarfato bavar kardam I believed your words Ye ruz e sard e paeez One cold spring dayGoldoneto shekasty You broke your flower potMesle aroose golha Like the bride of flowersTo golkhune neshasty You sat in the flower house [greenhouse] Bahar miyad dobare Spring comes againBazam toro miyaran They bring you againMesle gole zinati Like a flower To golkhone mikaran They sit in the flower house Bazam be goldonet migy You continue to tell your flower potBa man bemun hamishe Be with me foreverMigi ke bi to mimiram You say I will die without youGol bi goldon nemishe There cannot be a flower without a flower pot Migufty bi to hicham You said I am nothing without youBa man bemun hamishe Be with me foreverNabashi man mimiram If you are not here I will dieGol bi goldoon nemishe There cannot be a flower without a flower pot Che eshtebahi kardam “ “Harfato bavar kardamChe eshtebahi kardamHarfato bavar kardam Ye ru zesar de paeezGoldoneto shekastyMesle aroose golhaTo golkhune neshasty Bahar miyad dobareBazam toro miyaranMesle gole zinatiTo golkhone mikaran Bazam be goldonet migyBa man bemun hamisheMigi ke bi to mimiramGol bi goldon nemishe Che eshtebahi kardamHarfato bavar kardamChe eshtebahi kardamHarfato bavar kardamChe eshtebahi kardamHarfato bavar kardamChe eshtebahi kardamHarfato bavar kardam
